doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
creation: circa 1799; alteration: mid 19th century; alteration: late 19th century; alteration: 1969; alteration: 1996; alteration: 1996-1997

late 18th century, Mt Ida moved to this site from Buckingham Co 1996--Turkey Run Farm--Holly Hill--Mantlepiece in Scottsville Museum--Martin Dawson Home 1826--Isaac T Forbes Home 1848--Thomas W W Brockenbrough Home 1881--Mary Cunningham Home

1 Story Frame, 31'x21' Hall Parlor, 2 Column Portico, 4 Bay, T-Plan, 3 Course American Bond, Winter Kitchen, Beaded Siding, Rose Head Nails, Cut Nails, Mortise & Tenon Joinery, Pegged Joinery, Pitsaw Marks, Transom with Sidelights, 6 Panel Door, 6/6, 9/6, 9/9, Winter Kitchen, Bulkhead, Smokehouse, Icehouse, Well
21'x17' Frame Gable End Addition--Fr Ell Addition --Razed--Archaeology--Mt Ida relocated here
